snippet.title: AfterWar - Gameplay version 0.5.12
snippet.description:
Gameplay video for game newcomers, jury and observers of Indie Cup Ukraine 2024

⚡AfterWar is a strategy about the world in 2028 
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

📰 Telegram: https://t.me/afterwargame
💵 Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/Lumen_ua

The game was created by Dmytro Lumen (solo developer)

TAGS: #game #strategy #afterwar
